I'm more concerned with the fact that Ray ducks out of every debate without actually offering any evidence to support his assertions. When he is caught short and shown to be ignorant, he just declares that he is right and refuses to deal with anyone who would dare to disagree with him on the matter. It is really quite laughable.
 
 It goes a bit like this.
 
 Ray: Horses and other bovines can't have evolved.
 Anyone: Horses aren't bovines. They are equids.
 Ray: Since you don't know that horses are bovines according to Linneaus, then I'm not going to respond to you anymore.
 Anyone: Can you show that Linneaus said that horses were bovines?
 Anyone: Ray? Are you there?
 Anyone: Hello? Ray?
